title: After Five Months of Separation, Adele Has Filed for Divorce
text:
Photo: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for NARAS

Adele officially filed for divorce from her estranged husband, Simon Konecki, on Thursday. The torch singer announced her separation from Konecki five months ago, in a joint statement. The couple was together for seven years, and share a child: 6-year-old Angelo. “Adele and her partner have separated. They are committed to raising their son together lovingly,” the couple told AP in April. “As always they ask for privacy. There will be no further comment.” A month before, the “Someone Like You” songstress was seen at NYC gay bar Pieces with Jennifer Lawrence, clearly going through it. According to People, Adele filed in California which could entitle Konecki to half her marriage-acquired assets. Adele, in turn, could be entitled to half of Konecki’s Life Water fortunes.
description: Adele has filed for divorce from Life Water magnate Simon Konecki. The couple have a child, Angelo. Adele filed in California, which means the couple may have to split assets, if there wasn’t a prenup.
